name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AutoRefresh Pro - Smart Web Page Reloader

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AutoRefresh Pro - Smart Web Page Reloader

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"AutoRefresh Pro is a powerful yet easy-to-use browser extension designed to automatically reload web pages at custom intervals. Perfect for anyone who needs their tabs to stay up-to-date without manual refreshing, AutoRefresh Pro allows you to set individual reload times for each tab or page. Enjoy a seamless browsing experience with this intelligent auto-refresh tool that remembers your settings and operates effortlessly on any website.

Features:
* Automatically reload web pages after a custom number of seconds.
* Set different refresh intervals for each tab or page.
* Save and remember your preferences per website URL.
* User-friendly interface with no tracking or data collection.
* Simple to install and use, no complex setup required.
Whether you're monitoring live updates, waiting for changes on a specific site, or simply want to keep your pages current, AutoRefresh Pro offers a hassle-free solution. Start refreshing your tabs with just a few clicks and let AutoRefresh Pro keep your browsing experience smooth and up-to-date.

Set your preferred reload interval, click start, and watch as your pages refresh themselves. To pause or stop, just click stop. Keep your browser content always current with AutoRefresh Pro!"
